page.title: 04TYPES OF EDUCATION
page.content: Five types of{Education}are in our area,a{Further Education}College,a 6th Form College, 3 secondary schools, 3 primary schools,a mentally handicapped school and a{private}primary school. The{state}primary school has about 250 children. The private school has 137, half of whom are boarders,and a higher number of teachers. The secondary schools are:1 mixed,1 boys and 1 girls school. However the boys and girls school are combining into a mixed school. The 6th form college is for students to take G.C.E. exams and have finished secondary education. King Alfred's College of Further Education is mainly for training teachers. Greenacres is a school for mentally handicapped.It tries to help children fulfil their own potential. Winchester Childrens' Centre helps 130 pupils with social problems.
